paper_abstract: TODAY'S EMBEDDED SYSTEMS REQUIRE BOTH REAL-TIME CONTROL FUNCTIONS AND IT FUNCTIONS. INTEGRATING MULTIPLE OPERATING SYSTEMS ON A MULTICORE PROCESSOR IS ONE WAY TO MEET THESE REQUIREMENTS. HOWEVER, IN THIS APPROACH, ONE OPERATING SYSTEM'S FAILURE CAN BRING DOWN THE OTHER OPERATING SYSTEMS. TO ADDRESS THIS ISSUE, THE AUTHORS PROPOSE A MULTIDOMAIN EMBEDDED SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE WITH A PHYSICAL PARTITIONING CONTROLLER.
paper_title: DOMAIN PARTITIONING TECHNOLOGY FOR EMBEDDED MULTICORE PROCESSORS
